account.orderdetails.cancel.tooltip.cont:
If a "Cancel Order" button is displayed in your Order Details, you can cancel your order. Only an order with status "new" can be canceled (order has not been submitted to the backend). Only the complete order can be canceled.

Once the cancellation process begins, you will be able to view the status of your cancel request. Below are the status messages you may see:

Pending Cancellation - Your cancel request has been submitted, but not yet finalized.

Canceled - This order has been canceled.
